text: Madge Gertrude Adam (6 March 1912 - 25 August 2001) was an English solar astronomer. She was "internationally known for her work on the nature of sunspots and on their magnetic fields." She worked at the University of Oxford in the Department of Astrophysics from 1937-1979. She was a member of the Royal Astronomical Society. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:2001 deaths Category:British astronomers
title: Madge Adam
